categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: During the Yuuzhan Vong War, the invading Yuuzhan Vong species attacked Hakassi. In response to the failed Operation Trinity in 29 ABY, the Yuuzhan Vong launched an offensive against Galactic Alliance shipyards. The Hakassi and Kuat shipyards were first targeted. Afterwards, the Yuuzhan Vong moved to Dac and attacked the Mon Calamari Shipyards.
